meaning_str.bing:
n. 说明；形容；描写（文字）；类型
网络. 描述；商品描述；产品描述

说明；形容；描写（文字）；类型
描述；商品描述；产品描述

描述；描绘；形容；说明；刻画；种类；类型；类别；品种；特征；概述

sogou-kaoyan.n: 描述; 描写; 形容[出现0次)];类别[出现0次)]

1.en: Description - End users need some sort of explanation and guidance that describes the purpose and usage of the form.
1.cn: 描述——终端用户需要描述表单用途和用法的解释和指导。

2.en: Candace: Well, requirements are spelled out in the description, and I don't have much to add, really.
2.cn: 该职位的要求在描述中已经一一列出了，我没有什么可补充的了。

3.en: Reference to profits and losses of any description are (respectively) to profits and losses of that description made at any time.
3.cn: 凡提述任何种类的利润及亏损之处，即（分别）提述在任何时间所产生的该种类的利润及亏损。

0.en: I was quite moved by her description and I was wondering if there was any chance you might be willing to part with it.
0.cn: 妈妈的描述让我很心动，不知道哥哥能不能考虑把它转让给我。

1.en: Not part of the job description. Lights.
1.cn: 那些都不属于你的工作范畴。开灯。

2.en: Someone answering his description has been seen in this neighborhood.
2.cn: 有个符合他特征的人被这一带的人看到了。

3.en: Oh, what did you put as the one-word description of yourself?
3.cn: 噢，你在"一个词形容自己"那栏填了什么?

4.en: The online description was completely misleading. They said eight slots, plus removable ID.
4.cn: 网站上的产品说明，完全是在误导，上面说，有八个插缝，加一个可抽取的ID卡夹。

5.en: It turns out the JEKYLL and HYDE, it's a much better description of ourselves than we usually think.
5.cn: 似乎《杰柯尔与海德》里的双重人格更好地形容了我们的特点，比我们通常所想的更真切。

6.en: You know I get sentimental, and I was going through some of Mother's old sheave-work and I came across a description of a planet she claimed was the most rare and beautiful estate she ever owned.
6.cn: 你知道我很多愁善感，我在整理妈妈从前工作的时候发现了一颗行星，曾经被妈妈称为她拥有过的最罕见最美丽的地方。
